Method Detail

parseOptionBlock

protected static java.lang.String[] parseOptionBlock(java.lang.String optionBlock)
                                              throws CommandLineParsingException
Parses an option block i.e. a String containing an option key and an option value ("optionkey=optionvalue")

Parameters:
optionBlock - String containing the option block
Returns:
String array of length 2 with at index 0 the option key and at index 1 the option value
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the option block is malformed and cannot be parsed
CommandLineParsingException

Parameters:
optionBlock - String containing the option block
Returns:
String containing the option key
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the option block is malformed
CommandLineParsingException

                                           throws CommandLineParsingException
Extracts the value from the "inputFormat" option block: checks that the option is correctly named and that it has one of the allowed values

Parameters:
optionBlock - String containing the "inputFormat" option block
Returns:
String containing the value of the "inputFormat" option block
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - Thrown if it is not possible to extract the input format information from this option block

                                              throws CommandLineParsingException,
                                                     CommandLineInputsException
Parses a colouring names block into objectsColourAssociations

Parameters:
optionBlock - String containing option block to be parsed
Returns:
Vector of objectsColourAssociations where the object is a String with the name of the nodes to use for colouring
Throws:
CommandLineParsingException
CommandLineInputsException

narrowToSubtree

protected static void narrowToSubtree(TreeNCBI treeNCBI,
                                      java.lang.String taxIDOfNodeToNarrowTo)
                               throws InvalidInputsException
Modifies the NCBI tree by narrowing the tree to the subtree rooted at the specified taxonomy ID.

Parameters:
treeNCBI - TreeNCBI upon which the narrowing operation must be carried out
taxIDOfNodeToNarrowTo - String containing the taxonomy ID the tree is to be narrowed to
